sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>true</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>sys_atf_step_config</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Check step environment</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) { // If the step environment is UI and the user is not maint if (current.step_env.changes() && current.step_env == "d2cb02e1870312009dccc9ded0e3ec7c" && !gs.getUser().hasRole("maint")) { current.step_env.setError(gs.getMessage("Only users with maint role can set the step environment to UI")); current.setAbortAction(true); } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-08-10 22:23:51</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path/> <sys_id>3667275353012200503829cac2dc34d5</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Check step environment</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Automated Test Framework" source="com.glide.automated_testing_framework">ee18bcec3cb1311068bcf327dfe37fc8</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_3667275353012200503829cac2dc34d5</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2016-08-11 21:18:08</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=3667275353012200503829cac2dc34d5"/> </record_update>
